ygData.subject: Re: Banded Prices
ygData.msgSnippet: ore...free mold...few gold water...few silver cost of materials is only a couple of plat, so for someone to sell a few gold above cost, the tunic would have to
ygData.messageBody:
ore...free
mold...few gold
water...few silver

cost of materials is only a couple of plat, so for someone to sell a few gold above cost, the tunic would have to be no more than about 5 plat....i've never seen anybody selling that cheap. 10plat a tunic is still a big profit, 20plat a tunic is a huge profit, anything above 20plat is a rip off.

> As for the fixed prices, I'm all for it. I haven't reached the level where
> I can make banded yet, but when I get there, I want more than a few gold
> profit for my wares. I do have a further suggestion though. When you see
> people selling at a few gold above cost, bargain with them to get their
